about_the_game:
Welcome to smart3Dplanner2!

Your intelligent space planning app.

Plan your rooms and interiors easily in 3D.

Description:

Discover smart3Dplanner2, the revolutionary app for designing your living and working spaces! Whether it's renovation, redesign or professional interior design - our app offers you all the tools you need to make your vision a reality.

Highlights:

• Intuitive 3D planning: Draw floor plans, furnish rooms and experience your designs in an impressive 3D view.

• Furniture library: Choose from an extensive collection of furniture and accessories to perfectly design your home.

• User-friendly: Easy to use for beginners, but powerful features for professionals.

• Save & share projects: Save your designs and share them with family, friends or colleagues.

Why Smart3DPlanner2?

With smart3Dplanner2, space planning has never been easier. Our app combines user-friendly features with cutting-edge technology so you can create stunning designs in minutes. Whether you want to renovate a room or plan an entire house, we give you the tools to turn your ideas into reality.

Download smart3Dplanner2 now and start your 3D room planning!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X/Leopard 10.5/Snow Leopard 10.6/Lion 10.7/Montain Lion 10.8
  • Processor: Intel 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2,00 GHz) / AMD Phenom™ (2,00 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 / GeForce GTX 480 / Radeon HD 5450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: With smart3Dplanner2 you are able to create 3D floor plans and furnish and decorate them with the help of an extensive furniture library.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
